\SetAPI{J-C}
\section{ambeth.xml.transfer.pattern}
\label{configuration:AmbethXmlTransferPattern}
\ClearAPI
Defines in which packages the Ambeth \type{ClasspathScanner} scans for classes which implement or are annotated with a given class (e.g \type{XmlRootElement}, \type{BootstrapModule}). Multiple patterns can be provided by separating them with a semicolon ';', each pattern has to be a regular expression. The default pattern is "de/osthus.*".

%% GENERATED USAGE REFERENCE END
\type{de.osthus.ambeth.config.XmlConfigurationConstants.PackageScanPatterns}
\begin{lstlisting}[style=Props,caption={Usage example for \textit{ambeth.xml.transfer.pattern}}]
ambeth.xml.transfer.pattern=de/osthus.*
\end{lstlisting}
